quote.text: DO YOU WANT TO KNOW WHO YOU ARE? DON'T ASK. ACT! ACTION WILL DELINEATE AND DEFINE YOU.
quote.author: Thomas Jefferson

quote.text: I MUST LOSE MYSELF IN ACTION, LEST I WITHER IN DESPAIR.
quote.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote.text: ACTION MAY NOT ALWAYS BRING HAPPINESS; BUT THERE IS NO HAPPINESS WITHOUT ACTION
quote.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote.text: A REAL DECISION IS MEASURED BY THE FACT THAT YOU'VE TAKEN A NEW ACTION. IF THERE'S NO ACTION, YOU HAVEN'T TRULY DECIDED.
quote.author: Tony Robbins
